channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14526] Remove delayed rpc
item.description: I don't really know anyone using it and it makes things a bit more complex.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
We can remove stuff like


private static final String WARN_DELAYED_CALLS = "hbase.ipc.warn.delayedrpc.number";



  private static final int DEFAULT_WARN_DELAYED_CALLS = 1000;

And from Call


protected boolean delayResponse;

...

protected boolean delayReturnValue;           // if the return value should be

                                                  // set at call completion

Else patch LGTM

-1 overall
